
```{sql connection=db}
SELECT ac.carrier, ac.name, af.dep_delay, af.year
FROM carriers ac
JOIN flights af
on ac.carrier = af.carrier
WHERE ac.carrier in ("AS", "DL", "F9", "AA", "NK", "B6","HA")
GROUP BY ac.carrier
HAVING af.year >= 2000
LIMIT 20;
```
